thread.title: 'Super Mario'-Themed Shot Glasses Will Warp You Into Inebriation
thread.title_full: 'Super Mario'-Themed Shot Glasses Will Warp You Into Inebriation

author: Rebecca OConnell
title: 'Super Mario'-Themed Shot Glasses Will Warp You Into Inebriation
text:
Amazon Like us on Facebook 
Level up your drinking with themed shot glasses that look like they belong in a level of Super Mario Bros . The green, plastic containers—which resemble the warp pipes seen in the Nintendo franchise—are big enough for a double shot, so they might actually bring you to a new dimension if you drink enough of them. The shot glasses come in sets of four, so you can invite Mario, Luigi, and Peach over for a pregame session.
